item.title: Full Disk Encrypted Ubuntu 20.04 in a small dedicated server.
item.description: I miss the time when I was still exploring a lot of things in the Linux world. Nowadays, I’m mostly working with servers that are pre-provisioned and almost ready out of the box. Those are nice conveniences for work. I decided though to go back and be like me again ten years ago. Requirements: Experiments with small dedicated server It should be encrypted on disk. Have fun while doing it.
